abilities.name: Hook
abilities.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards Stitches and deal 91 damage.

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: Deal 104 damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Deal 319 damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of Stitches's maximum Health.

heroics.name: Putrid Bile
heroics.description: Emit bile that deals 37 damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. Stitches gains 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

heroics.name: Gorge
heroics.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources. Cannot be used on massive Heroes.
